subject: Re: Promising plane crash debris ITC audio
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
Thanks, Tom!
Looking forward to it...
Once I get them I'll send you a special secret web link so you can read 
alot more about where the debris came from.  I'm sending the link to 
all the researchers once they e-mail me the files so those who 
participated can check their audio against the facts of the crash.

- Mike C.

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Tom Arnold <topgun0123@...> wrote:
>
> Mike,
>  We will be conducting our session on saturday night.You will have 
the files by sunday night.We plan to do it for about a half hour for 
you because it is three of us.
> Tom
